name: Super Darts VR
description: Super Darts VR is an easy and simple dart game simulator that you can enjoy with other players. You can experience the realistic dart throwing sensation in a virtual space. Face other players in the dart game with pleasant special effects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350  equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer , 1x USB 2.0 or newer
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350  equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer , 1x USB 2.0 or newer
